arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

params.sqlcmd: "select " +" T_ALLOC_FIXED_ODR_RSLT.\\"ALCTED_UNCONFIRM_ODR_NO\\" as \\"ALCTED_UNCONFIRM_ODR_NO\\", " +" T_ALLOC_FIXED_ODR_RSLT.\\"ALCTED_UNCONFIRM_ODR_QTY\\" as \\"ALCTED_UNCONFIRM_ODR_QTY\\", " +" T_ALLOC_FIXED_ODR_RSLT.\\"ALCTED_SEQ_CD\\" as \\"ALCTED_SEQ_CD\\", " +" T_ODR.\\"REMAIN_UNCONFIRM_ODR_QTY\\" as \\"REMAIN_UNCONFIRM_ODR_QTY\\", " +" T_ODR.\\"ODR_UNIT_PRICE\\" as \\"ODR_UNIT_PRICE\\", " +" T_ODR.\\"CURRNCY_CD\\" as \\"CURRNCY_CD\\", " +" T_ODR.\\"ODR_QTY\\" as \\"ODR_QTY\\", " +" T_ODR.\\"ODR_TYP\\" as \\"ODR_TYP\\" " +"from " +" T_ALLOC_FIXED_ODR_RSLT, " +" T_ODR " +"where " +" T_ALLOC_FIXED_ODR_RSLT.ALCTED_UNCONFIRM_ODR_NO = T_ODR.ODR_NO " +" and T_ALLOC_FIXED_ODR_RSLT.\\"FIXED_ODR_NO\\" = ? " +" and T_ALLOC_FIXED_ODR_RSLT.\\"DEL_FLG\\" = '0' " +" and T_ODR.\\"DEL_FLG\\" = '0' " +"order by " +" T_ALLOC_FIXED_ODR_RSLT.\\"ALCTED_SEQ_CD\\" desc"

"select " +" T_ODR.\\"REMAIN_UNCONFIRM_ODR_QTY\\" as \\"REMAIN_UNCONFIRM_ODR_QTY\\", " +" T_ODR.\\"UNCONFIRM_ODR_BALANCE\\" as \\"UNCONFIRM_ODR_BALANCE\\" " +"from " +" T_ODR " +"where " +" T_ODR.\\"ODR_NO\\" = ?"

"select " +" to_char(T_ODR.ODR_QTY) as ODR_QTY, " +" to_char(T_ODR.DESINATED_DLV_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as DESINATED_DLV_DATE, " +" ODR_SPCL_PRICE.VALUE as SPCL_PRICE_TYP, " +" to_char(T_ODR.ODR_UNIT_PRICE) as ODR_UNIT_PRICE, " +" M_CUR.CUR_UNIT, " +" T_ODR.CUS_DLV_KEY_CD as CUS_DLV_KEY_CD, " +" T_ODR.CUS_DLV_CD as CUS_DLV_CD, " +" T_ODR_CTL.ITEM_CD as ITEM_CD, " +" M_ITEM.ITEM_NAME as ITEM_NAME, " +" T_ODR_CTL.CUST_CD as CUST_CD, " +" M_CUST.CUST_NAME as CUST_NAME, " +" to_char(M_CUST.EXCH_TYP) as EXCH_TYP, " +" to_char(M_CUST.DETAIL_ROUND_TYP) as DETAIL_ROUND_TYP, " +" T_ODR_CTL.CUST_ITEM_CD as CUST_ITEM_CD, " +" M_ITEM_SPEC.CUST_ITEM_NAME as CUST_ITEM_NAME, " +" T_ODR.CUST_ODR_NO as CUST_ODR_NO, " +" ODR_ODR_TYP.VALUE as ODR_TYP, " +" T_ODR.REMAIN_UNCONFIRM_ODR_QTY as REMAIN_UNCONFIRM_ODR_QTY, " +" T_ODR.SHIP_PLAN_REMAIN_QTY as SHIP_PLAN_REMAIN_QTY, " +" T_ODR.CANCELED_UNCONFIRM_ODR_QTY as CANCELED_UNCONFIRM_ODR_QTY, " +" T_ODR.ODR_TYP as ODR_TYP_CD, " +" T_ODR.CURRNCY_CD as CURRNCY_CD, " +" to_char(T_ODR.ODR_ACPT_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as ODR_ACPT_DATE, " +" T_ODR.DEPO_TYP as DEPO_TYP, " +" to_char(T_ODR.PUCH_ODR_QTY_TOTAL) as PUCH_ODR_QTY_TOTAL, " +" T_ODR.IF_CTL_NO as IF_CTL_NO, " +" T_ODR.ODR_CTL_NO as ODR_CTL_NO, " +" T_ODR.UNIT_CD as UNIT_CD, " +" T_ODR.DLV_LOC_CD as DLV_LOC_CD, " +" T_ODR.DLV_LOC_NAME_KANJI as DLV_LOC_NAME_KANJI, " +" T_ODR.REMARKS as REMARKS, " +" T_ODR.CUST_CHRG_PSN_CD as CUST_CHRG_PSN_CD, " +" USER_MST.USER_NAME as CUST_CHRG_PSN_NAME, " +" T_ODR.CUST_CHRG_ORG_CD as CUST_CHRG_ORG_CD, " +" M_ORG.ORG_NAME as CUST_CHRG_ORG_NAME, " +" T_ODR.ODR_ACPT_PSN_CD as ODR_ACPT_PSN_CD, " +" to_char(T_ODR.MODIFY_COUNT) as MODIFY_COUNT, " +" decode(T_ANS_DLV_DATE.ODR_NO, NULL, 'N', 'Y') as ANS_DLV_DATE_EXIST_FLG, " +" decode(T_SHIP_ODR.ODR_NO, NULL, 'N', 'Y') as T_SHIP_ODR_EXIST_FLG, " +" M_ITEM.STOCK_UNIT as STOCK_UNIT, " +" M_ITEM.PKG_UNIT as PKG_UNIT, " +" M_ITEM.UNIT_QTY_TYP as UNIT_QTY_TYP, " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY.COMPANY_CD as COMPANY_CD " +"from " +" ( " +" select " +" * " +" from " +" T_ODR " +" where " +" DEL_FLG = 0 " +" and ODR_CMPLT_FLG = 0 " +" and TOTAL_SHIP_QTY = 0 " +" and(ODR_TYP = 1 " +" or (ODR_TYP = 2 " +" and REMAIN_UNCONFIRM_ODR_QTY = ODR_QTY) " +" or ODR_TYP = 3) " +" ) T_ODR, " +" ( " +" select " +" * " +" from " +" T_ODR_CTL " +" where " +" DEL_FLG = 0 " +" ) T_ODR_CTL, " +" ( " +" select " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE.VALUE, " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE.DISPLAY_NAME " +" from " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE " +" where " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE.NAME = 'ODR_SPCL_PRICE' " +" ) ODR_SPCL_PRICE, " +" ( " +" select " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE.VALUE, " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE.DISPLAY_NAME " +" from " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE " +" where " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE.NAME = 'ODR_ODR_TYP' " +" ) ODR_ODR_TYP, " +" ( " +" select " +" M_CUST.* " +" from " +" M_CUST, " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY " +" where " +" M_CUST.COMPANY_CD = SYS_MY_COMPANY.COMPANY_CD " +" and SYS_MY_COMPANY.CTRL_CD = 'SYSTEM' " +" ) M_CUST, " +" ( " +" select " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY.COMPANY_CD " +" from " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY " +" where " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY.CTRL_CD = 'SYSTEM' " +" ) SYS_MY_COMPANY, " +" ( " +" select " +" ODR_NO " +" from " +" T_ANS_DLV_DATE " +" where " +" DEL_FLG = 0 " +" group by " +" ODR_NO " +" ) T_ANS_DLV_DATE, " +" ( " +" select " +" ODR_NO " +" from " +" T_SHIP_ODR " +" where " +" DEL_FLG = 0 " +" group by " +" ODR_NO " +" ) T_SHIP_ODR, " +" M_CUR, " +" M_ITEM, " +" M_ITEM_SPEC, " +" USER_MST, " +" M_ORG " +"where " +" T_ODR.ODR_NO = ? " +" and T_ODR.ODR_NO = T_ANS_DLV_DATE.ODR_NO(+) " +" and T_ODR.ODR_NO = T_SHIP_ODR.ODR_NO(+) " +" and T_ODR.ODR_CTL_NO = T_ODR_CTL.ODR_CTL_NO " +" and T_ODR_CTL.CUST_CD = M_CUST.CUST_CD " +" and ODR_SPCL_PRICE.VALUE = T_ODR.SPCL_PRICE_TYP " +" and ODR_ODR_TYP.VALUE = T_ODR.ODR_TYP " +" and T_ODR_CTL.ITEM_CD = M_ITEM.ITEM_CD " +" and T_ODR.CURRNCY_CD = M_CUR.CUR_CD " +" and M_ITEM_SPEC.COMPANY_CD = SYS_MY_COMPANY.COMPANY_CD " +" and M_ITEM_SPEC.CUST_CD = T_ODR_CTL.CUST_CD " +" and M_ITEM_SPEC.CUST_ITEM_CD = T_ODR_CTL.CUST_ITEM_CD " +" and T_ODR.CUST_CHRG_PSN_CD = USER_MST.USER_CD(+) " +" and T_ODR.CUST_CHRG_org_CD = M_ORG.ORG_CD(+)"
"select to_char(T_ODR.MODIFY_COUNT) as MODIFY_COUNT " +"from T_ODR " +"where T_ODR.ODR_NO = ? " +"for update nowait " +""

"select to_char(M_UNIT_COST.UNIT_COST) " +"from M_UNIT_COST, " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY " +"where SYS_MY_COMPANY.CTRL_CD ='SYSTEM' " +" and M_UNIT_COST.COMPANY_CD = SYS_MY_COMPANY.COMPANY_CD " +" and M_UNIT_COST.CUST_CD = ? " +" and M_UNIT_COST.ITEM_CD = ? " +" and M_UNIT_COST.EFF_PHASE_IN_DATE <= ? " +"order by M_UNIT_COST.EFF_PHASE_IN_DATE desc"

"select to_char(SYS_DATE_CTRL.BUSINESS_OPR_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as BUSINESS_OPR_DATE " +" from SYS_DATE_CTRL " +"where SYS_DATE_CTRL.PLANT_CD = (select SYS_CLASS_CODE.CODE " +" from SYS_CLASS_CODE " +" where SYS_CLASS_CODE.SYS_CLASS = 'SALES' " +" and SYS_CLASS_CODE.CLASS_CODE = 'PLANT_WEB' " +" and rownum = 1)"

"select " +" M_CUST_BASE.\\"DLV_LOC_NAME\\" as \\"DLV_LOC_NAME\\" " +"from " +" M_CUST_BASE, " +" M_WH " +"where " +" M_CUST_BASE.SHIP_WH_CD = M_WH.WH_CD " +" and M_CUST_BASE.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CUST_BASE.\\"CUST_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CUST_BASE.\\"DLV_LOC_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" T_ALLOC_FIXED_ODR_RSLT.\\"ALCTED_UNCONFIRM_ODR_NO\\" as \\"ALCTED_UNCONFIRM_ODR_NO\\", " +" T_ALLOC_FIXED_ODR_RSLT.\\"ALCTED_UNCONFIRM_ODR_QTY\\" as \\"ALCTED_UNCONFIRM_ODR_QTY\\", " +" T_ALLOC_FIXED_ODR_RSLT.\\"ALCTED_SEQ_CD\\" as \\"ALCTED_SEQ_CD\\", " +" T_ODR.\\"REMAIN_UNCONFIRM_ODR_QTY\\" as \\"REMAIN_UNCONFIRM_ODR_QTY\\", " +" T_ODR.\\"ODR_UNIT_PRICE\\" as \\"ODR_UNIT_PRICE\\", " +" T_ODR.\\"CURRNCY_CD\\" as \\"CURRNCY_CD\\", " +" T_ODR.\\"ODR_QTY\\" as \\"ODR_QTY\\", " +" T_ODR.\\"ODR_TYP\\" as \\"ODR_TYP\\" " +"from " +" T_ALLOC_FIXED_ODR_RSLT, " +" T_ODR " +"where " +" T_ALLOC_FIXED_ODR_RSLT.ALCTED_UNCONFIRM_ODR_NO = T_ODR.ODR_NO " +" and T_ALLOC_FIXED_ODR_RSLT.\\"FIXED_ODR_NO\\" = ? " +" and T_ODR.\\"DEL_FLG\\" = '0' " +"order by " +" T_ALLOC_FIXED_ODR_RSLT.\\"ALCTED_SEQ_CD\\""

"select " +" T_ODR.\\"ODR_NO\\" as \\"ODR_NO\\", " +" T_ODR.\\"CURRNCY_CD\\" as \\"CURRNCY_CD\\", " +" to_char(T_ODR.\\"ODR_UNIT_PRICE\\") as \\"ODR_UNIT_PRICE\\", " +" to_char(T_ODR.\\"REMAIN_UNCONFIRM_ODR_QTY\\") as \\"REMAIN_UNCONFIRM_ODR_QTY\\" " +"from " +" T_ODR, " +" T_ODR_CTL " +"where " +" T_ODR.ODR_CTL_NO = T_ODR_CTL.ODR_CTL_NO " +" and T_ODR.\\"ODR_TYP\\" = 2 " +" and T_ODR.\\"DEL_FLG\\" = 0 " +" and T_ODR.\\"REMAIN_UNCONFIRM_ODR_QTY\\" > 0 " +" and T_ODR_CTL.\\"CUST_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_ODR_CTL.\\"CUST_ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +"order by " +" T_ODR.\\"DESINATED_DLV_DATE\\", " +" T_ODR.\\"ODR_NO\\""
"select " +" SYS_CLASS_CODE.\\"CODE\\" as \\"CODE\\" " +"from " +" SYS_CLASS_CODE " +"where " +" SYS_CLASS_CODE.\\"SYS_CLASS\\" = 'SALES' " +" and SYS_CLASS_CODE.\\"CLASS_CODE\\" = ?"
"SELECT " +" NVL(SUM(NVL(A.ALCTED_UNCONFIRM_ODR_QTY, 0)), 0) " +"FROM " +" T_ALLOC_FIXED_ODR_RSLT A " +"WHERE " +" A.FIXED_ODR_NO = ? " +" AND A.DEL_FLG = '0'"
